title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.142 - Hospital
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.142 - Hospital

State Regulations

An establishment with an organized medical staff; with
permanent facilities that include inpatient beds; and with medical services, including continuous nursing services, that provide diagnosis and treatment for
patients. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.142

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
